description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You see the thin lines of magic between your creations. You can exploit that connection with a small shift of power traveling from one rune to another. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.impossible-playtest-actions.Item.ozrq9hAuigjzwe9C]{Invoke Runes} on two different rune-bearers within 60 feet. In addition to the runes' normal effects, a chain of glowing script flows between them, dealing @Damage[((floor(@actor.level/2))d6)[force]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in the line, but not the rune-bearers. Creatures can attempt a @Check[reflex|against:runesmith|basic|options:area-effect] saving throw; on a critical failure, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} as the runes seal their movements until the end of your next turn or until they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}. The DC to escape is your class DC.

At 12th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6.
